fromResource

public static String fromResource(String resourceName)
Loads a Classpath Resource and returns it as single String

Parameters:
resourceName - the classpath resource to load, relative to the StringUtils class. E.g. use "/foo.txt" to load files from the root of the classpath.
Returns:
a String with the whole content of the file. Newlines are replaced with the newline character.
Throws:
RuntimeException - if there was any IO error with the resource
